description: Support the effective implementation of theNational Poverty Reduction strategy snd Action Plan through identification of sectoral programmes and projects, local poverty inititiatives, creation of an enabling environment for the poor.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The poverty alleviation programme acknowledges economic growth not only as a means to address poverty, but as a mechanism to achieve the national MDG targets through implementation of the PRSAP. Central to the programme will be the support for development of policies and legislation pieces that contribute to stimulation of innovative use of the productive resources by all, in particular, the poor through evidence-based planning. Capacity development to generate data, analyze information through the Threshold 21 mid-term planning model.
subproject.title: POVERTY REDUCTION INTIATIVES
